接口 ChessBoard

  • 所有已知实现类:
    JavaFXChessBoard, SwingChessBoard

    public interface ChessBoard
    components of an arbitrary chessboard
    作者:
    Bruce Dong

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addPiece(ChessPiece piece, int row, int col)
      Adds a piece to the board at the desired location.
      ChessGame getGameRules()
      Returns the rules of the game.
      int getNumColumns()
      Returns the number of columns in the board.
      int getNumRows()
      Returns the number of rows in the board.
      ChessPiece getPiece(int row, int col)
      Returns the chess piece at a specific location on the board.
      boolean hasPiece(int row, int col)
      Returns true if there is a piece at a specific location of the board.
      ChessPiece removePiece(int row, int col)
      Removes a piece from the board
      void setGameRules(ChessGame newRules)
      Changes the rules of the game
      boolean squareThreatened(int row, int column, ChessPiece piece)
      Returns true if a particular square is threatened by an opposing piece.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setGameRules

        void setGameRules(ChessGame newRules)
        Changes the rules of the game
        参数:
        newRules - the new rules for the game

      • getGameRules

        ChessGame getGameRules()
        Returns the rules of the game.
        返回:
        the rules of the game

      • addPiece

        void addPiece(ChessPiece piece,
              int row,
              int col)
        Adds a piece to the board at the desired location. Any piece currently at that location is lost.
        参数:
        piece - the piece to add
        row - the row for the piece
        col - the column for the piece

      • removePiece

        ChessPiece removePiece(int row,
                       int col)
        Removes a piece from the board
        参数:
        row - the row of the piece
        col - the column of the piece
        返回:
        the piece removed of null if there was no piece at that square

      • hasPiece

        boolean hasPiece(int row,
                 int col)
        Returns true if there is a piece at a specific location of the board.
        参数:
        row - the row to examine
        col - the column to examine
        返回:
        true if there is a piece a this row and column and false if the square is empty

      • getPiece

        ChessPiece getPiece(int row,
                    int col)
        Returns the chess piece at a specific location on the board.
        参数:
        row - the row for the piece
        col - the column for the piece
        返回:
        the piece at the row and column or null if there is no piece there.

      • squareThreatened

        boolean squareThreatened(int row,
                         int column,
                         ChessPiece piece)
        Returns true if a particular square is threatened by an opposing piece.
        参数:
        row - the row of the square
        column - the column of the square
        piece - a piece of the game
        返回:
        true if the square can be attacked by a piece of an opposing side as the parameter piece

      • getNumRows

        int getNumRows()
        Returns the number of rows in the board.
        返回:
        the number of rows

      • getNumColumns

        int getNumColumns()
        Returns the number of columns in the board.
        返回:
        the number of columns
